about_the_game:
THIS IS A DEMO



STORY
Placidie, a young woman in her twenties, is living in a small settlement where its inhabitants harvest and breed the local fauna.

But a purple sheep will have changed Placidie's life forever. Transported to a place with more than exotic life, returning to her family will be her sole purpose. With the help of a mysterious shepherd's staff's abilities, she will obtain the support of sheep who will be her comrades, but above all, her weapons to navigate and face the dangers of this insane world.


GAME
  • Fight through a crazy, colorful universe, accentuated by comics visuals effects and delirious animals.
  • Use your herd of sheep to fight enemies by either throwing them or make them charge. Don't forget that you can use them to improve your movements.
  • Experience a story rich in action and visuals, mixing humor and intrigue.


STUDIO COATS
We're French students at ETPA Rennes who made this game as a study project for our Bachelor.

We're releasing this DEMO as there are several reasons for this :
  • This would be our first game published on Steam.
  • It's a good way to show our skills.
  • Getting feedback and knowing if the game brings interest will mean of lot for us!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-5005U 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Embark on the fantastic world of Oh Sheep!, a slapstick cartoon-style action game where you'll encounter crazy enemies. Sheep will be your salvation.
